text: The Real Housewives is an international reality television franchise created by Scott Dunlop which began in America in 2006. Each version of the show is about the lives of a group of wealthy women who live in a certain city or geographic area. The first version of the show was The Real Housewives of Orange County. Some of the most famous cast members of the show include Yolanda Hadid, Teresa Giudice, Kyle Richards, Lisa Rinna, Lisa Vanderpump, NeNe Leakes, Porsha Williams and Tanya Bardsley. == Versions == Country Area English title Year Start End Melbourne The Real Housewives of Melbourne 2014 2021 Sydney The Real Housewives of Sydney 2017 — Vancouver The Real Housewives of Vancouver 2012 2013 Toronto The Real Housewives of Toronto 2017 2017 — The Real Housewives 2013 2013 Athens The Real Housewives of Athens 2011 2011 — The Real Housewives of Hungary 2017 2020 Naples The Real Housewives of Naples 2019 2020 Nairobi The Real Housewives of Nairobi 2023 — Amsterdam The Real Housewives of Amsterdam 2022 — Auckland The Real Housewives of Auckland 2016 2016 Lagos The Real Housewives of Lagos 2022 — Abuja The Real Housewives of Abuja 2023 — Warsaw The Real Housewives of Warsaw 2023 — — The Real Housewives of Slovenia 2021 2021 Cape Town The Real Housewives of Cape Town 2022 — Durban The Real Housewives of Durban 2021 — Gqueberha The Real Housewives of Gqeberha 2023 — Johannesburg The Real Housewives of Johannesburg 2018 — Pretoria The Real Housewives of Pretoria 2022 — Winelands The Real Housewives of the Winelands 2023 — Cheshire The Real Housewives of Cheshire 2015 — Jersey The Real Housewives of Jersey 2020 2022 Georgia The Real Housewives of Atlanta 2008 — California The Real Housewives of Beverley Hills 2010 — D.C.
